name: esri-rollup-example
description: Example application using Rollup to bundle local ES2015 modules that use CDN hosted modules from the ArcGIS API for JavaScript

scripts.build: npm test && rollup -c rollup-config.js && node scripts/postbuild.js && uglifyjs -o dist/bundle.min.js dist/bundle.js

author: Tom Wayson <tom@tomwayson.com>
